name: Eye Want You Lengthening + Volumizing Clean Mascara
about: What it is:An endlessly buildable mascara that lengthens, defines, and volumizes for a natural-to-bold lash, with a clean, pigment-rich, and flake-free formula..Formulation Type:Volumizing, Curling.Highlighted Ingredients:- Carnuaba and Candelilla Wax Blend: Ultra-creamy texture for maximum build..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Ultraclean, safe ingredients for the delicate eye area. A plant-based wax blend delivers nourishing length and volume without clumping, flaking, or transferring. Go natural to bold—in just a few swipes—with an hourglass-shaped brush crafted from plant-based filament to catch every last lash.
ingredients: WATER (AQUA) EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX [EUPHORBIA CERIFERA CERA] BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER [BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER] POLYGLYCERYL-6 DISTEARATE DIMER DILINOLEYL DIMER DILINOLEATE COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX [COPERNICIA CERIFERA WAX] GLYCERIN POLYGLYCERYL-10 MYRISTATE CETYL ALCOHOL GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE XANTHAN GUM ARGININE PHENETHYL ALCOHOL IRON OXIDES (CI 77499)....	...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: ..-Hold the brush horizontally at the base of the lashes and use a slight side-to-side wiggling motion to build thickness and volume..-Washes off effortlessly with mild soap and water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Glossy separates well looks natural not clumpy at all
